## Checklist

- [ ] Follows [PLUGIN-FORMAT.md](../PLUGIN-FORMAT.md) specification
- [ ] Components have required YAML frontmatter
- [ ] Shell scripts pass ShellCheck
- [ ] Markdown passes markdownlint
- [ ] JSON files are valid
- [ ] CATALOG.md updated (if adding/removing components)
- [ ] README.md updated (if adding/removing components)
- [ ] Tested locally with the installer
